mapper.select: SELECT REVIEW_NO, REVIEW_ID, REVIEW_CONTENT, REVIEW_CLASSNO, REVIEW_STAR, REVIEW_DATE, REVIEW_UPDATE FROM REVIEW WHERE REVIEW_CLASSNO = ${review_classno} ORDER BY REVIEW_NO DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REVIEW VALUES(REVIEWSEQ.NEXTVAL, #{review_id}, #{review_content}, #{review_classno}, #{review_star}, SYSDATE, NULL)
